description: Unit: Create React Native app (iOS + Android) in repo with reproducible dev/build workflow
Unit: Define environment config for hosted dev/stage/prod (no self-hosted in V1)
Unit: Add typed REST API client wrapper with consistent error mapping
Unit: Add request middleware for auth headers, tenant headers (if required), and user-agent tagging
Unit: Add network timeouts and retry/backoff for safe idempotent requests
Unit: Add global app state bootstrapping (auth gate) and splash/loading sequence
Unit: Add navigation skeleton (tabs + stack) and deep link routing for ticket detail
Unit: Add basic design system primitives (colors/typography/spacing) aligned with Alga web
Unit: Add skeleton/loading/empty/error states standard library
Unit: Add secure storage abstraction (Keychain/Keystore) for session secrets
Unit: Add PII-safe logging abstraction with redaction and log level controls
Unit: Add analytics scaffolding (screen views + key actions) with opt-out hook (optional)
Unit: Add crash/error reporting hook (provider TBD) with PII redaction
Unit: Add caching layer for ticket list/detail with TTL + invalidation on updates
Unit: Add pull-to-refresh and background refresh on app resume
Unit: Add offline detection UX (always-connected warning + retry actions)
Unit: Add accessibility baseline (labels, focus order, touch target sizes)
Unit: Add localization scaffolding (en-US first)
Unit: Add Settings screen shell + diagnostics (version/build/environment)
Unit: Add CI job to lint/typecheck mobile app package
Unit: Add CI job to run mobile unit tests
Unit: Add documentation for mobile local dev and build/release process
E2E: Implement sign-in screen that launches system browser to Alga hosted login
E2E: Implement deep link callback handler with state validation and OTT capture
E2E: Exchange OTT for mobile API credential via server endpoint
E2E: Persist session securely and restore on cold start
E2E: Implement session refresh/rotation before expiry
E2E: Handle refresh failure (revoked/expired) by routing to sign-in
E2E: Implement logout that revokes server-side session and clears local storage
E2E: Support Microsoft SSO via web login (no provider-specific native SDK)
E2E: Support Google SSO via web login (no provider-specific native SDK)
E2E: Record device/app metadata with session issue (for audit/analytics)
E2E: Implement optional biometric gate to re-open app (local-only)
E2E: Ensure tokens are never logged or sent to crash reports
E2E: Implement auth capability discovery endpoint (mobile enabled, providers available)
E2E: Implement resilient UX for auth outages (retry, clear messaging)
E2E: Support vanity/hosted domains for login handoff (configurable allowlist)
E2E: Implement Tickets list screen with infinite scroll pagination
E2E: Implement pull-to-refresh to reload first page
E2E: Show ticket number/id, subject/title, status, priority, assignee, client/company, updated-at
E2E: Render status and priority badges with accessible contrast
E2E: Implement server-side sorting (default updated-at desc)
E2E: Implement server-side search with debounced input
E2E: Implement filter UI for status, assignee, priority, updated-since
E2E: Add quick filters: My tickets, Unassigned, High priority, Recently updated
E2E: Support combining filters and show active filter summary
E2E: Support clear-all filters
E2E: Persist last-used filters per user
E2E: Handle empty results and error retries gracefully
E2E: Prefetch ticket detail for first visible rows (optional)
E2E: Implement ticket stats summary header using tickets stats endpoint (optional)
E2E: Ensure list results respect RBAC and data visibility
E2E: Implement Ticket detail screen with loading skeleton and refresh
E2E: Render ticket header (number/title/status/priority/assignee)
E2E: Render requester/contact and client/company summary
E2E: Render key timestamps (created/updated/closed) with relative time
E2E: Render description with safe link handling (optional markdown)
E2E: Render comments/timeline with pagination
E2E: Differentiate internal vs public comments visually
E2E: Show commenter identity and timestamp for entries
E2E: Support copy ticket id/number and “open in web” link-out
E2E: Handle 404/403 states with friendly UX
E2E: Cache last-viewed ticket detail (TTL)
E2E: Ensure detail respects RBAC and field-level visibility
E2E: Implement add-comment composer (multiline) with send action
E2E: Support comment visibility selection (internal vs public)
E2E: Validate comment length and show inline errors
E2E: Post comment and update timeline on success
E2E: Preserve draft on failure/navigation and allow retry
E2E: Prevent duplicate submissions while in-flight
E2E: Implement status picker using server-provided allowed statuses
E2E: Submit status change and update ticket header/list badges
E2E: Handle 409 conflicts (ticket changed elsewhere) with refresh + retry UX
E2E: Include mobile client metadata on update calls (audit)
E2E: Ensure updates respect RBAC and server-side validation
E2E: Implement assign-to-me action and reflect in UI
E2E: Implement unassign action when permitted
E2E: Implement priority update via picker
E2E: Implement due date update (if supported by API)
E2E: Implement watchers/subscribers add/remove (if supported by API)
E2E: Implement time entry creation from ticket (if supported by API)
E2E: Surface validation errors clearly for partial updates
E2E: Support field-level loading indicators for partial updates
Unit: Implement Settings screen showing current user identity and tenant
Unit: Add “clear cache” action
Unit: Add “logout” action
Unit: Add “about/legal” screens (privacy policy/terms)
Unit: Add toggles: biometric gate, hide sensitive info in notifications (future)
Unit: Optimize list rendering (virtualized list, avoid re-renders)
Unit: Optimize payload sizes via slim DTOs / field selection (server support)
Unit: Handle timezone/locale formatting consistently
Unit: Add privacy review checklist and PII inventory for mobile data flows
Unit: Add observability events for auth success/failure and API error rates
Checklist: Set up iOS TestFlight and Android internal testing pipelines
Checklist: Define signing, versioning, and release notes process
Checklist: Add app icon/splash assets
Checklist: Add rollout checklist and rollback plan
Integration: Add mobile handoff endpoint/page that issues a short-lived, single-use OTT for authenticated web sessions
Integration: Add storage for mobile OTTs with expiry, single-use semantics, and tenant/user binding
Integration: Add API endpoint to exchange OTT for mobile API credential (short-lived) and refresh token/rotation mechanism
Integration: Integrate with existing Microsoft/Google SSO configurations used by web login
Integration: Add API endpoint to refresh/rotate mobile credentials and invalidate old tokens
Integration: Add API endpoint to revoke mobile sessions (logout)
Integration: Add endpoint for mobile capability discovery (mobile enabled, providers available, TTLs)
Integration: Add rate limiting for OTT issue/exchange/refresh endpoints
Integration: Add audit logging for mobile session issue/refresh/revoke events
Integration: Ensure ticket APIs used by mobile are available and documented (list/search/detail/comments/status/assignment/stats)
Integration: Ensure ticket comment create API supports internal/public visibility flag
Integration: Ensure consistent error shape for validation/auth errors for mobile clients
Integration: Add migrations for new tables/columns used by mobile auth
Integration: Add tests for OTT single-use + expiry and credential rotation
Integration: Add documentation for mobile auth configuration and hosted domain allowlist
Deferred: Implement push notification registration (APNs/FCM) and device token management
Deferred: Add server endpoints to register/unregister device tokens
Deferred: Send push notifications for assignment/status/mention events
Deferred: Deep link from push notification into ticket detail
Deferred: Add notification preferences screen
Deferred: Add base URL selection and self-hosted domain onboarding UX
Deferred: Document self-hosted requirements for mobile handoff URLs and SSO callback domains
Deferred: Add self-hosted connectivity diagnostics and TLS certificate troubleshooting UX
Unit: Implement standardized API error mapping: network vs validation vs auth vs permission vs server error
Unit: Implement global HTTP 401 handler (attempt refresh once then force sign-in)
Unit: Implement global HTTP 403 handler (show no-access UX)
Unit: Implement request cancellation for superseded ticket search queries
Unit: Implement request deduplication for concurrent identical GETs
Unit: Implement app-level telemetry correlation id on every request
Unit: Implement secure handling of deep link URLs (reject unexpected hosts/paths)
Unit: Implement “open in web” URL builder for hosted environments
Unit: Implement clipboard helper that redacts sensitive fields by default (configurable)
Unit: Implement app state restoration for last-viewed tab and last-opened ticket (optional)
Unit: Implement memory leak guardrails for large lists (profiling checklist)
Unit: Implement startup performance budget and measurement
E2E: Implement OTT exchange retry with exponential backoff and single-flight guard
E2E: Implement refresh token rotation handling with safe rollback on failures
E2E: Implement session revocation check on app resume (throttled)
E2E: Implement sign-in error UX for invalid tenant/provider configuration
E2E: Implement sign-in error UX for user without required ticket permissions
E2E: Implement sign-in UX copy that clearly indicates “internal users only”
E2E: Implement List:Filters - status multi-select
E2E: Implement List:Filters - assignee (me/unassigned) selector
E2E: Implement List:Filters - priority selector
E2E: Implement List:Filters - updated-since date picker
E2E: Implement List:Filters - sort selector
E2E: Implement List:UX - filter chip summary bar
E2E: Implement List:UX - clear-all filters CTA
E2E: Implement List:UX - last refreshed timestamp
E2E: Implement List:UX - pull-to-refresh haptics (optional)
E2E: Implement List:Errors - 401 handling (refresh then sign-in)
E2E: Implement List:Errors - 403 handling (no access)
E2E: Implement List:Errors - 5xx retry with backoff
E2E: Implement List:Errors - network offline retry
E2E: Implement List:Perf - prefetch next page threshold tuning
E2E: Implement List:Perf - cache invalidation on updates
E2E: Implement ticket detail - sectioned layout (header/details/comments)
E2E: Implement ticket detail - pull-to-refresh indicator states
E2E: Implement ticket detail - open-in-web uses stable URL format
E2E: Implement ticket detail - copy actions for id/number
E2E: Implement ticket detail - link handling opens external browser with confirmation (optional)
E2E: Implement ticket detail - comment pagination (load more)
E2E: Implement ticket detail - internal/public comment badges
E2E: Implement ticket detail - render system events (status/assignee changes) distinctly (if present)
E2E: Implement ticket detail - cache invalidation after posting comment/status change
E2E: Implement ticket detail - optimistic UI for comment post with rollback on failure
E2E: Implement ticket detail - optimistic UI for status change with rollback on failure
E2E: Implement ticket detail - conflict resolution prompt on 409
E2E: Implement ticket detail - consistent date formatting per locale
E2E: Implement ticket detail - accessibility: headings for sections
E2E: Implement ticket detail - accessibility: timeline entries read in sensible order
E2E: Implement ticket detail - scroll-to-latest comment quick action (optional)
E2E: Implement ticket detail - jump-to-top button on long timelines (optional)
E2E: Implement updates - draft persistence per ticket
E2E: Implement updates - draft cleared on successful send
E2E: Implement updates - comment length limit enforcement matches server
E2E: Implement updates - comment visibility default (internal) and remembered per user
E2E: Implement updates - status list fetched and cached with TTL
E2E: Implement updates - status transitions validated server-side with friendly error messages
E2E: Implement updates - disable send while offline with queued draft (no offline send)
E2E: Implement updates - toast feedback for success/failure
E2E: Implement updates - field-level spinners for partial updates
E2E: Implement updates - retry mechanism for transient failures
E2E: Implement updates - prevent double-tap submits
E2E: Implement updates - include app version/device id headers on mutations
E2E: Implement updates - assign-to-me button shows disabled state when already assignee
E2E: Implement updates - priority picker disables invalid choices (if server provides)
E2E: Implement updates - due date picker supports clearing due date (if allowed)
E2E: Implement updates - time entry form validates required fields and rounds durations per policy
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - OTT is bound to user session id to prevent replay across sessions
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - OTT includes nonce/state and is single-use
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - OTT expiry configurable (default short, e.g., 60s)
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - exchange endpoint validates OTT + state + device metadata shape
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - refresh token rotation with immediate invalidation of prior refresh token
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - capabilities endpoint returns providers enabled and mobile auth enabled flag
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - capabilities endpoint returns hosted domain allowlist
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - rate limiting per IP and per user for exchange/refresh
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - audit logs include device id, app version, user id, tenant, action
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - consistent error response schema for auth errors
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - ticket comment visibility enforcement matches permissions (public vs internal)
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - ticket list endpoint supports updated-since filter used by mobile
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - ticket list endpoint supports assignee=me and assignee=unassigned filters
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - ticket detail endpoint returns enough fields for header + detail sections
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - ticket comments endpoint supports pagination and ordering
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - ticket status update endpoint validates transitions and returns updated summary
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - ticket assignment update endpoint supports assign-to-self without separate user lookup
Integration: Implement server mobile auth - time entry create endpoint validates ticket association and permissions
Unit: Quality/Ops - end-to-end analytics event names cataloged and versioned
Unit: Quality/Ops - crash reporting excludes request/response bodies by default
Unit: Quality/Ops - redaction rules cover ticket subjects and comment bodies
Unit: Quality/Ops - API latency measurement per route
Unit: Quality/Ops - SLOs defined for key endpoints (list/detail/mutate)
Unit: Quality/Ops - accessibility audit checklist executed pre-release
Unit: Quality/Ops - security review checklist executed pre-release
Unit: Quality/Ops - dependency vulnerability scanning enabled for mobile package
Unit: Quality/Ops - mobile build reproducibility checks in CI
Checklist: Release - store listing draft (Phase 1)
Checklist: Release - screenshot capture plan for App Store / Play Store
Checklist: Release - internal beta distribution runbook
Checklist: Release - support escalation runbook for auth issues
Checklist: Release - minimum OS support policy documented
Checklist: Release - feature gating to disable Phase 2 modules in production builds
E2E: Login handoff -> exchange OTT -> land on ticket list
E2E: Open ticket -> add INTERNAL comment -> verify shown as internal
E2E: Open ticket -> add PUBLIC comment -> verify shown as public
E2E: Open ticket -> change status -> verify reflected in header and list
E2E: Assign to me -> set priority -> verify list badges update
Integration: OTT single-use and expiry enforced
Integration: Mobile credential rotation invalidates prior token
Security: Mobile mutation endpoints enforce same RBAC as web
